text: Arthur Sneyers was a sailor from Belgium, who represented his country at the 1928 Summer Olympics in Amsterdam, Netherlands. Sneyers, as crew member on the Belgian 6 Metre Ubu, took 5th place with helmsman A. J. J. Fridt and fellow crew members Ludovic Franck, Frits Mulder and Willy Van Rompaey. == Sources == * Category:Sailors at the 1928 Summer Olympics – 6 Metre Category:Olympic sailors of Belgium Category:Belgian male sailors (sport) Category:Year of birth missing Category:Possibly living people
title: Arthur Sneyers
